about.teamDesc: At Higherd, you get genuine candidate backgrounds, higher employee retention rates, and dedicated support to optimize all international procedures.
about.subtitle: Our mission is to make recruiting human and effective.

hero.title: Frankfurt made HR-Tech
hero.subtitle: Higherd Solutions is an HR-tech startup based in Frankfurt. The company was founded by Vitena Xhori, who started with traditional recruiting of civil engineers abroad and outsourcing services for German companies. As the company grew, we discovered more talented candidates from other STEM fields who not only have the required qualifications but also bring a vibrant spectrum of solution-oriented perspectives to the challenges of German industry.

specialties.title: What sets us apart
specialties.desc: We offer a fully automated hiring journey, including VISA and relocation procedures, onboarding and upskilling. Transparency is our highest value, ensuring verified qualifications through real experts. Our innovative 'Reverse Employment' feature allows companies to access top talent faster. The unique value-based matching algorithm guarantees perfect alignment between candidate skills and expectations and company global values and local culture.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.metaDescription: Terms of Service for Higherd.de - AI-powered cultural fit assessment platform. Learn about your rights and responsibilities.
terms.heading: Terms of Service

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.p1: Welcome to Higherd.de – an AI-powered platform that evaluates cultural fit between candidates and organizations.
section1.p2: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of the platform as:
section1.p3: By using Higherd.de, you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree, you may not use our services.

section2.title: 2. Description of Services
section2.service1: An AI-based cultural fit analysis tool
section2.service2: Matching and recommendations to support hiring decisions
section2.service3: Dashboards, insights, and explainable AI outputs
section2.noteText: Our AI system does not make final hiring decisions. It assists human decision-makers in recruitment processes.

section3.title: 3. Access to the Platform
section3.item1: You must provide accurate, complete information to register.
section3.item2: Companies must ensure only authorized personnel access the platform.
section3.ageText: You must be 16 years or older to use the platform.

section4.title: 4. Acceptable Use
section4.permittedText: You may only use the platform for legitimate recruitment and application purposes in compliance with applicable laws and regulations.
section4.prohibited1: Reverse-engineer or tamper with the AI system
section4.prohibited3: Use the platform in a discriminatory or unethical manner
section4.prohibited4: Misuse the Cultural Fit Score for unlawful exclusion

section5.title: 5. Artificial Intelligence & Automated Scoring
section5.p1: Higherd.de uses explainable AI models to generate a Cultural Fit Score based on candidate inputs and company culture data. These models:
section5.item1: Do not rely on sensitive personal data (e.g. race, gender)
section5.item3: Are auditable and reviewed by humans
section5.oversightText: AI-based assessments are supportive, not determinative. Final decisions rest with human users (recruiters).

section6.title: 6. User Responsibilities
section6.employer1: You are responsible for lawful hiring decisions.
section6.employer2: You may not rely solely on the Cultural Fit Score.
section6.employer3: You must comply with all anti-discrimination laws and GDPR obligations.
section6.candidate1: You may request an explanation of your score.
section6.candidate2: You may object to automated processing.
section6.candidate3: You can request human review of your evaluation.

section7.title: 7. Privacy and Data Protection
section7.intro: The use of the platform is subject to our Privacy Policy. Key points:
section7.point1: Data is processed under GDPR, BDSG (Germany), and the EU AI Act.
section7.point2: Users have rights to access, correct, delete, and object to their personal data.
section7.point3: AI is used in accordance with legal and ethical frameworks.

section8.title: 8. Availability & Support
section8.text: We strive to maintain 99% uptime monthly. However, occasional interruptions may occur due to maintenance or system updates.

section9.title: 9. Liability
section9.candidatesText: Higherd.de is not responsible for final hiring outcomes. The AI evaluation is advisory and does not guarantee employment.
section9.employersText: We are not liable for hiring decisions made by your company based on the platform's outputs.
section9.generalText: We are only liable for damages caused by intent or gross negligence, or violations of essential contractual obligations. We are not liable for indirect or consequential damages.

section10.title: 10. License and Usage Rights
section10.text: You receive a non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the platform for the agreed-upon term. You may not reproduce, resell, or commercially exploit any part of the system or content.

section11.title: 11. Termination
section11.employersText: Contractual terms and termination rights are outlined in your service agreement.
section11.candidatesText: You may delete your account at any time. We will delete or anonymize your data in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

section12.title: 12. Modifications to These Terms
section12.text: We may modify these Terms to reflect legal, technical, or operational changes. We will notify you of material updates via email or platform notice.

section13.title: 13. Governing Law & Jurisdiction
section13.text: These Terms are governed by the laws of Germany, unless otherwise required by local law. Jurisdiction is Berlin, Germany, where legally permissible.
